value:
Ninja are essentially spies, right?
If I am to play the part, I'd better be
careful to avoid detection.

I wonder... Are ninja similar to the
spies of Ostia or the assassins of
the Black Fang? Or, perhaps both?

Are you getting enough rest? You
should always be ready to head out
for battle, even at a moment's notice.

This outfit is quite impressive. I feel
even more nimble than usual in it.

Katana, kunai, shuriken... These
weapons are all so interesting.

Are you $Nu?$k$pI have a confidential message for you
from $Nf.

Hm, did I get a little too carried
away? How embarrassing...

Find an opening, and then strike it
in an instant... Perhaps archers and
ninja are more alike than I thought.
Is...that it?
I won't let you down.

I am Igrene, a guardian of Nabata,
the place I call my home. I hear this
outfit is perfect for stealth missions.

So, how did I fare in that last battle?
I was worried about fighting without
my bow, but I think I did well enough.$k$pI suppose that means I am becoming
accustomed to all of this, but I still
have much to learn...$k$pSpeaking of which, I have heard that
female ninja are called "kunoichi."$k$pSurely the Order of Heroes has its
own detachment of spies, right?$k$pI'm well aware of the danger that
comes with the role, but...I want to
support the Order from the shadows.$k$pPerhaps then, I might come closer to
understanding how my late husband
felt while he worked...
はあっ
覚悟！
ああっ
やりますね…
I've come for your life.
There's no escape.
I'll see the job done!
This will be your end!
I failed...
ふふ…
It's interesting to wear an outfit from so far beyond Nabata.
Another attempt at teasing me? One of these days, you'll need to act your age.
How long has it been since I've used anything other than a bow?
The children flock to me every time I come by in this outfit. They want me to strike poses for them.
This may be just a festival to some, but I see it as a chance to learn.
The more I learn about ninja, the more I wonder... Were these the kinds of things he had to do?
I will be your shadow, ever vigilant against those who would do you harm.
Your orders?
Which way?
The mission begins.
